General.Name: Nova Leap Health Corp
General.Description: Nova Leap Health Corp. provides home and home health care services in the United States and Canada. Its services include dementia care, companionship, personal and skilled nursing care, meal preparation, bathing, dressing, grooming, housekeeping, errands, transportation, and medication reminders. Nova Leap Health Corp. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Halifax, Canada.
General.Address: 7071 Bayers Road, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3L 2C2
